Title: â†©ï¸ French journalist Jaffar Ait Audia published a report on the g...
Description: TASS: Bach accused the IBA of lacking evidence that two athletes failed gender tests. According to the head of the IOC, from a scientific point of view, Iman Khelif and Lin Yuting are eligible to participate in the women's tournament. Algerian performance at the Olympic women's boxing tournament... French journalist Jaffar Ait Audia published a report on the gender test of the winner of the boxing tournament at the Olympic Games in Paris, Iman Khelif from Algeria. The report data is provided by the Reduxx portal. According to the conclusion, as a result of the MRI, it was determined that Khelif had no uterus and the presence of internal testicles. A chromosome test confirmed the Algerian woman's XY karyotype, and a hormonal test recorded the same level of testosterone as in men.

Title: â†©ï¸ Acting Governor of the Tambov Region Pervyshov told TASS that ...
Description: TASS: â—ï¸Evgeny Pervyshov became the first Russian governor - a veteran of a special operation.
